# The `LazyCallGraphDOTPrinterPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A pass which prints the call graph as a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dot">DOT</a> file to a <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a></code>.

This is primarily useful for visualization purposes.

Definition at line 1300 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/lazycallgraph-h">LazyCallGraph.h</a>.
